        This bug requires manual review: We are only 7 days from stable.<span class="line"><!---->This bug requires manual review: We are only 7 days from stable.<!----></span><br>Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<!----></span><br><br>1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<span class="line"><!---->1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<!----></span><br>- Chrome: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome: <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<!----></a><br>- Chrome OS: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome OS: <!----></span>https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines"><!---->https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<!----></a><br>2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<span class="line"><!---->2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<!----></span><br>3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<span class="line"><!---->3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<!----></span><br>4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<span class="line"><!---->4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<!----></span><br>5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<span class="line"><!---->5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<!----></span><br>6. Is this a new feature?<span class="line"><!---->6. Is this a new feature?<!----></span><br>7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?<span class="line"><!---->7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?<!----></span><br><br>Chrome OS Only:<span class="line"><!---->Chrome OS Only:<!----></span><br>8. Was the change reviewed and approved by the Eng Prod Representative? See Eng Prod ownership by component: <span class="line"><!---->8. Was the change reviewed and approved by the Eng Prod Representative? See Eng Prod ownership by component: <!----></span>http://go/cros-engprodcomponents<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://go/cros-engprodcomponents"><!---->http://go/cros-engprodcomponents<!----></a><br><br>Please contact the milestone owner if you have questions.<span class="line"><!---->Please contact the milestone owner if you have questions.<!----></span><br>Owners: benmason@(Android), bindusuvarna@(iOS), marinakz@(ChromeOS), pbommana@(Desktop)<span class="line"><!---->Owners: benmason@(Android), bindusuvarna@(iOS), marinakz@(ChromeOS), pbommana@(Desktop)<!----></span><br><br>For more details visit <span class="line"><!---->For more details visit <!----></span>https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage"><!---->https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage<!----></a> - Your friendly Sheriffbot<span class="line"><!----> - Your friendly Sheriffbot<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products.             Issue 1208721: Security: heap-over-flow in AutofillPopupControllerImpl::RemoveSuggestion
          <h1>
            
            Issue 1208721: Security: heap-over-flow in AutofillPopupControllerImpl::RemoveSuggestion
          </h1>
          
            Reported by
            
      <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/icon?family=Material+Icons" rel="stylesheet">
      schedule<i id="availability-icon" class="material-icons inline-icon ${user.last_visit_timestamp ? '': 'inline-icon-unseen'}" title="undefined" hidden="">schedule</i>
      zhanj...@gmail.com<a id="user-link" href="/u/1326165311" title="zhanj...@gmail.com"><!---->zhanj...@gmail.com<!----></a>
      zhanj...@gmail.com<span id="user-text" hidden=""><!---->zhanj...@gmail.com<!----></span>
      <div id="availability-text" class="availability-notice" title="undefined" hidden=""><!----><!----></div>
    <mr-user-link aria-label="issue reporter"></mr-user-link>
            on 
      Thu, May 13, 2021, 1:19 AM EDT
    <chops-timestamp title="Thu, May 13, 2021, 1:19 AM EDT"></chops-timestamp>
            
          <small class="byline">
            Reported by
            <mr-user-link aria-label="issue reporter"></mr-user-link>
            on <chops-timestamp title="Thu, May 13, 2021, 1:19 AM EDT"></chops-timestamp>
            
          </small>
        <div class="main-text">
          <h1>
            
            Issue 1208721: Security: heap-over-flow in AutofillPopupControllerImpl::RemoveSuggestion
          </h1>
          <small class="byline">

`index`, the `index` is used for accessing `suggestions_`[3][4] when user confirm that.<!----></span><br>`suggestions_`'s size can be changed while the confirm dialog is showing, then click the OK button, heap-over-flow occurs.<span class="line"><!---->`suggestions_`'s size can be changed while the confirm dialog is showing, then click the OK button, heap-over-flow occurs.<!----></span><br><br>VERSION<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b><br>Chrome Version: [Chrome 90.0.4430.210] + [stable]<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: [Chrome 90.0.4430.210] + CASE<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b><br><br>1. python3 -m http.server<span class="line"><!---->1. python3 -m http.server<!----></span><br>2. visit test.html<span class="line"><!---->2. visit test.html<!----></span><br>3. cache two suggestions "aa" and "bb"<span class="line"><!---->3. cache two suggestions "aa" and "bb"<!----></span><br>4. click the input control, press a and then hold the second suggestion on the popup, wait a second, click OK button<span class="line"><!---->4. click the input control, press a and then hold the second suggestion on         caching suggestions and shrinking `suggestion_`'s size can be done by a compromised renderer, the only interaction required is choosing a suggestion to delete.<span class="line"><!---->caching suggestions and shrinking `suggestion_`'s size can be done by a compromised renderer, the only interaction required is choosing a suggestion to delete.<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        Thanks for the detailed reproduction steps!<span class="line"><!---->Thanks for the detailed reproduction steps!<!----></span><br><br>This is indeed an issue and (as was demonstrated) affects at least all Android surfaces. The accessory path was mentioned in #1 and is seen in #3 and the dropdown path as seen in #2 doesn't use a callback but stores the index until the dialog confirmation returns [1].<span class="line"><!---->This is indeed an issue and (as was demonstrated) affects at least all Android surfaces. The accessory path was mentioned in #1 and is seen in #3 and the dropdown path as seen in #2 doesn't use a callback but stores the index until the dialog confirmation returns [1].<!----></span><br><br>The deletion on Desktop platforms use a different path (e.g. on Linux Shift + Del while focusing a item in the dropdown) and therefore don't seem affected (i.e. because the dropdown is updated with further input and there isn't even a confirmation dialog). I haven't checked what iOS does but it doesn't seem to use any of the involved classes.<span class="line"><!---->The deletion on Desktop platforms use a different path (e.g. on Linux Shift + Del while focusing a item in the dropdown) and therefore don't seem affected (i.e. because the dropdown is updated with further input and there isn't even a confirmation dialog). I haven't checked what iOS does but it doesn't seem to use any of the involved classes.<!----></span><br><br>I'll start a fix that just aborts the removal operation if the index is out of bounds which should be easy to merge to any branch.<span class="line"><!---->I'll start a fix that just aborts the removal operation if the index is out of bounds which should be easy to merge to any branch.<!----></span><br><br><br>[1] <span class="line"><!---->[1] <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/ui/android/autofill/autofill_popup_view_android.cc;l=142;drc=46bbb9795fcc1934c6cfbec096764f888c4d400a<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/ui/android/autofill/autofill_popup_view_android.cc;l=142;drc=46bbb9795fcc1934c6cfbec096764f888c4d400a"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/ui/android/autofill/autofill_popup_view_android.cc;l=142;drc=46bbb9795fcc1934c6cfbec096764f888c4d400a<!----></a><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

removal<span class="line"><!---->If the suggestions known to the popup controller change but a removal<!----></span><br>confirmation is still pending, the index held by the confirmation is out<span either:<!----></span><br>* delete an incorrect suggestions or<span class="line"><!---->* delete an incorrect suggestions or<!----></span><br>* cause a crash due to an out-of-bounds access.<span latter case but might need to be merged.<!----></span><br>A proper fix would involve wide-spread changes to the identification<span class="line"><!---->A proper fix would involve wide-spread changes         This bug requires manual review: We are only 7 days from stable.<span class="line"><!---->This bug requires manual review: We are only 7 days from stable.<!----></span><br>Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<!----></span><br><br>1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<span class="line"><!---->1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<!----></span><br>- Chrome: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome: <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<!----></a><br>- Chrome OS: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome OS: <!----></span>https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines"><!---->https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<!----></a><br>2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<span class="line"><!---->2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<!----></span><br>3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<span class="line"><!---->3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<!----></span><br>4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<span class="line"><!---->4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<!----></span><br>5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<span class="line"><!---->5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<!----></span><br>6. Is this a new feature?<span class="line"><!---->6. Is this a new feature?<!----></span><br>7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?<span class="line"><!---->7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?<!----></span><br><br>Chrome OS Only:<span class="line"><!---->Chrome OS Only:<!----></span><br>8. Was the change reviewed and approved by the Eng Prod Representative? See Eng Prod ownership by component: <span class="line"><!---->8. Was the change reviewed and approved by the Eng Prod Representative? See Eng Prod ownership by component: <!----></span>http://go/cros-engprodcomponents<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://go/cros-engprodcomponents"><!---->http://go/cros-engprodcomponents<!----></a><br><br>Please contact the milestone owner if you have questions.<span class="line"><!---->Please contact the milestone owner if you have questions.<!----></span><br>Owners: benmason@(Android), bindusuvarna@(iOS), marinakz@(ChromeOS), pbommana@(Desktop)<span class="line"><!---->Owners: benmason@(Android), bindusuvarna@(iOS), marinakz@(ChromeOS), pbommana@(Desktop)<!----></span><br><br>For more details visit <span class="line"><!---->For more details visit <!----></span>https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage"><!---->https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage<!----></a> - Your friendly Sheriffbot<span class="line"><!----> - Your friendly Sheriffbot<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

      <style>
        mr-issue-details {
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);

          margin-bottom: 1em;

        mr-edit-issue {
          margin-top: 40px;
        }
      </style>
      <mr-description></mr-description>
      <mr-comment-list headinglevel="2"></mr-comment-list>
      
    <!----></mr-issue-details>
              
      <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/icon?family=Material+Icons" rel="stylesheet">
      
        mr-launch-overview {
          max-width: 100%;
          display: flex;
          flex-flow: column;

          display: none;
        }

          margin-bottom: 0.75em;
        }

    <mr-launch-overview class="main-item" hidden=""><!---->
      <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/icon?family=Material+Icons" rel="stylesheet">
      <style>
        mr-launch-overview {
          max-width: 100%;
          display: flex;
          flex-flow: column;
          justify-content: flex-start;
          align-items: stretch;
        }
        mr-launch-overview[hidden] {
          display: none;
        }
        mr-phase {
          margin-bottom: 0.75em;

        Thanks for the detailed reproduction steps!<span class="line"><!---->Thanks for the detailed reproduction steps!<!----></span><br><br>This is indeed an issue and (as was demonstrated) affects at least all Android surfaces. The accessory path was mentioned in #1 and is seen in #3 and the dropdown path as seen in #2 doesn't use a callback but stores the index until the dialog confirmation returns [1].<span class="line"><!---->This is indeed an issue and (as was demonstrated) affects at least all Android surfaces. The accessory path was mentioned in #1 and is seen in #3 and the dropdown path as seen in #2 doesn't use a callback but stores the index until the dialog confirmation returns [1].<!----></span><br><br>The deletion on Desktop platforms use a different path (e.g. on Linux Shift + Del while focusing a item in the dropdown) and therefore don't seem affected (i.e. because the dropdown is updated with further input and there isn't even a confirmation dialog). I haven't checked what iOS does but it doesn't seem to use any of the involved classes.<span class="line"><!---->The deletion on Desktop platforms use a different path (e.g. on Linux Shift + Del while focusing a item in the dropdown) and therefore don't seem affected (i.e. because the dropdown is updated with further input and there isn't even a confirmation dialog). I haven't checked what iOS does but it doesn't seem to use any of the involved classes.<!----></span><br><br>I'll start a fix that just aborts the removal operation if the index is out of bounds which should be easy to merge to any branch.<span class="line"><!---->I'll start a fix that just aborts the removal operation if the index is out of bounds which should be easy to merge to any branch.<!----></span><br><br><br>[1] <span class="line"><!---->[1] <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/ui/android/autofill/autofill_popup_view_android.cc;l=142;drc=46bbb9795fcc1934c6cfbec096764f888c4d400a<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/ui/android/autofill/autofill_popup_view_android.cc;l=142;drc=46bbb9795fcc1934c6cfbec096764f888c4d400a"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/ui/android/autofill/autofill_popup_view_android.cc;l=142;drc=46bbb9795fcc1934c6cfbec096764f888c4d400a<!----></a><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>
        
          
        <div>
          
        </div>
      <div class="comment-body">
        <mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>
        <div>

Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<span class="line"><!---->1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<!----></span><br>- Chrome: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome: <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<!----></a><br>- Chrome OS: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome OS: <!----></span>https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines"><!---->https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<!----></a><br>2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<span class="line"><!---->2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<!----></span><br>3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<span class="line"><!---->3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<!----></span><br>4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<span class="line"><!---->4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<!----></span><br>5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<span class="line"><!---->5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<!----></span><br>6. Is this a new feature?<span class="line"><!---->6. Is this a new feature?<!----></span><br>7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?<span class="line"><!---->7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?<!----></span><br><br>Chrome OS Only:<span class="line"><!---->Chrome OS Only:<!----></span><br>8. Was the change reviewed and approved by the Eng Prod Representative? See Eng Prod ownership by component: <span class="line"><!---->8. Was the change reviewed and approved by the Eng Prod Representative? removal<span class="line"><!---->If the suggestions known to the popup controller change but a removal<!----></span><br>confirmation is still pending, the index held by the confirmation is out<span         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. security bugs may appear in Chrome release notes.         caching suggestions and shrinking `suggestion_`'s size can be done by a compromised renderer, the only interaction required is choosing a suggestion to delete.<span class="line"><!---->caching suggestions and shrinking `suggestion_`'s size can be done by a compromised renderer, the only interaction required is choosing a suggestion to delete.<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        Thanks for the detailed reproduction steps!<span class="line"><!---->Thanks for the detailed reproduction steps!<!----></span><br><br>This is indeed an issue and (as was demonstrated) affects at least all Android surfaces. The accessory path was mentioned in #1 and is seen in #3 and the dropdown path as seen in #2 doesn't use a callback but stores the index until the dialog confirmation returns [1].<span class="line"><!---->This is indeed an issue and (as was demonstrated) affects at least all Android surfaces. The accessory path was mentioned in #1 and is seen in #3 and the dropdown path as seen in #2 doesn't use a callback but stores the index until the dialog confirmation returns [1].<!----></span><br><br>The deletion on Desktop platforms use a different path (e.g. on Linux Shift + Del while focusing a item in the dropdown) and therefore don't seem affected (i.e. because the dropdown is updated with further input and there isn't even a confirmation dialog). I haven't checked what iOS does but it doesn't seem to use any of the involved classes.<span class="line"><!---->The deletion on Desktop platforms use a different path (e.g. on Linux Shift + Del while focusing a item in the dropdown) and therefore don't seem affected (i.e. because the dropdown is updated with further input and there isn't even a confirmation dialog). I haven't checked what iOS does but it doesn't seem to use any of the involved classes.<!----></span><br><br>I'll start a fix that just aborts the removal operation if the index is out of bounds which should be easy to merge to any branch.<span class="line"><!---->I'll start a fix that just aborts the removal operation if the index is out of bounds which should be easy to merge to any branch.<!----></span><br><br><br>[1] <span class="line"><!---->[1] <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/ui/android/autofill/autofill_popup_view_android.cc;l=142;drc=46bbb9795fcc1934c6cfbec096764f888c4d400a<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/ui/android/autofill/autofill_popup_view_android.cc;l=142;drc=46bbb9795fcc1934c6cfbec096764f888c4d400a"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/ui/android/autofill/autofill_popup_view_android.cc;l=142;drc=46bbb9795fcc1934c6cfbec096764f888c4d400a<!----></a><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

autofill suggestion<span class="line"><!---->[Android] Fix trying to remove out-of-bounds autofill suggestion<!----></span><br><br>If the suggestions known to the popup controller change but a removal<span class="line"><!---->If the suggestions known to the popup controller change but a removal<!----></span><br>confirmation is still pending, the index held by the confirmation is out<span class="line"><!---->confirmation is still pending, the index held by the confirmation is out<!----></span><br>of date and can either:<span class="line"><!---->of date and can either:<!----></span><br>* delete an incorrect suggestions or<span class="line"><!---->* delete an incorrect suggestions or<!----></span><br>* cause a crash due to an out-of-bounds access.<span latter case but might need to be merged.<!----></span><br>A proper fix would involve wide-spread changes to the identification<span class="line"><!---->A proper fix would involve wide-spread changes to the identification<!----></span><br>of a selected suggestions (see <span class="line"><!---->of a selected suggestions (see <!----></span>https://crbug.com/1209792<a class="" target="_blank"         This bug requires manual review: We are only 7 days from stable.<span class="line"><!---->This bug requires manual review: We are only 7 days from stable.<!----></span><br>Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<!----></span><br><br>1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<span class="line"><!---->1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<!----></span><br>- Chrome: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome: <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<!----></a><br>- Chrome OS: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome OS: <!----></span>https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines"><!---->https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<!----></a><br>2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<span class="line"><!---->2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<!----></span><br>3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<span class="line"><!---->3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<!----></span><br>4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<span class="line"><!---->4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<!----></span><br>5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<span class="line"><!---->5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<!----></span><br>6. Is this a new feature?<span class="line"><!---->6. Is this a new feature?<!----></span><br>7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?<span class="line"><!---->7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?<!----></span><br><br>Chrome OS Only:<span class="line"><!---->Chrome OS Only:<!----></span><br>8. Was the change reviewed and approved by the Eng Prod Representative? See Eng Prod ownership by component: <span class="line"><!---->8. Was the change reviewed and approved by the Eng Prod Representative? See Eng Prod ownership by component: <!----></span>http://go/cros-engprodcomponents<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://go/cros-engprodcomponents"><!---->http://go/cros-engprodcomponents<!----></a><br><br>Please contact the milestone owner if you have questions.<span class="line"><!---->Please contact the milestone owner if you have questions.<!----></span><br>Owners: benmason@(Android), bindusuvarna@(iOS), marinakz@(ChromeOS), pbommana@(Desktop)<span class="line"><!---->Owners: benmason@(Android), bindusuvarna@(iOS), marinakz@(ChromeOS), pbommana@(Desktop)<!----></span><br><br>For more details visit <span class="line"><!---->For more details visit <!----></span>https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage"><!---->https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage<!----></a> - Your friendly Sheriffbot<span class="line"><!----> - Your friendly Sheriffbot<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>
        
          
        <div>
          
        </div>
      <div class="comment-body">
        <mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>
        <div>
          
        </div>
      </div>

            Target project:<label for="targetProjectInput">Target project:</label>
            
              <input id="targetProjectInput" aria-owns="chops-autocomplete-1" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-activedescendant="">
              
      
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }

        for LitElement.

 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
<script type="text/javascript" nonce="">
 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
</script>
